hero.title: k2 Stealth Network Tunnel
hero.subtitle: Deploy in one command, ECH encryption, undetectable
hero.description: Kaitu k2 is a next-generation stealth tunnel protocol based on ECH (Encrypted Client Hello), supporting QUIC + TCP-WS dual-stack transport, proprietary adaptive congestion control, one-command deployment for both server and client, zero CT log exposure.

ech.title: ECH Stealth
ech.description: Encrypted Client Hello hides SNI completely. TLS handshake is undetectable, DPI deep packet inspection is ineffective

zeroDeploy.title: Zero-Config Deployment
zeroDeploy.description: One curl command installs both server and client. Auto-generates k2v5:// connection URI. No manual certificate configuration needed

transport.title: QUIC + TCP-WS Dual Stack
transport.description: Prioritizes QUIC for low-latency transport. Automatically falls back to TCP-WebSocket when QUIC is blocked. Seamless switching, imperceptible to users

congestion.title: Proprietary Congestion Control
congestion.description: Proprietary adaptive congestion control algorithm. Significantly outperforms BBR on high-loss networks. 3x throughput improvement in poor network conditions

reverseProxy.title: Reverse Proxy Camouflage
reverseProxy.description: Built-in reverse proxy forwards non-k2 traffic to a real website. Active probing returns legitimate HTTPS responses

selfSign.title: Self-Signed + Certificate Pin
selfSign.description: Self-signed certificate with certificate pinning. Zero CT log exposure. No certificate purchase required. Server domain completely hidden

comparison.title: Protocol Comparison
comparison.subtitle: k2v5 vs. mainstream anti-censorship protocols across key dimensions

security.title: k2v5 Protocol ‚Äî Next-Generation Stealth Tunnel
security.description: k2v5 is built on ECH (Encrypted Client Hello), completely solving SNI leakage. Combined with QUIC low-latency transport and proprietary adaptive congestion control, it achieves stable high throughput in high-loss, poor network conditions.

caTech.title: ECH Stealth Tunnel Technology
caTech.description: k2v5 uses ECH (Encrypted Client Hello) to encrypt the SNI field in the TLS handshake. DPI cannot identify the target domain. Active probing returns legitimate website responses. Undetectable at the protocol layer.

advantages.title: Core Features
advantages.item1: ECH encrypts SNI ‚Äî TLS handshake undetectable
advantages.item2: QUIC-first transport ‚Äî low latency, high throughput
advantages.item3: Proprietary adaptive congestion control ‚Äî 3x improvement on poor networks
advantages.item4: Reverse proxy camouflage ‚Äî active probe defense

adaptive.title: Adaptive Transport Layer
adaptive.item1: Auto-fallback from QUIC to TCP-WebSocket when blocked
adaptive.item2: Self-signed certificate + Pin ‚Äî zero CT log exposure
adaptive.item3: Port reuse ‚Äî coexists with real website on port 443

multipath.title: ECH Encrypted Handshake
multipath.description: Encrypted Client Hello hides SNI. TLS handshake completely undetectable. DPI identification fails

encryption.title: Dual-Stack Transport
encryption.description: QUIC-first low-latency transport. Automatic TCP-WebSocket fallback. Seamless switching, imperceptible to users

smartRouting.title: Proprietary Congestion Control
smartRouting.description: Proprietary adaptive congestion control algorithm. Outperforms BBR on high-loss networks. Significantly improved experience on poor networks

disguise.title: Reverse Proxy Camouflage
disguise.description: Built-in reverse proxy forwards non-tunnel traffic to real website. Active probing returns legitimate HTTPS response

failover.title: Zero-Config Deployment
failover.description: One curl command to install. Auto-generates k2v5:// connection URI. Complete deployment in 10 minutes

performance.title: Zero CT Log Exposure
performance.description: Self-signed certificate + certificate pinning. Completely bypasses CT log monitoring. Server domain fully hidden

kaitu.name: k2v5
kaitu.tech: ECH stealth + QUIC+TCP-WS dual stack + proprietary congestion control

trojan.name: WireGuard
trojan.tech: UDP encrypted tunnel, no TLS camouflage

v2ray.name: VLESS+Reality
v2ray.tech: TLS fingerprint spoofing + reverse proxy, no ECH

shadowsocks.name: Shadowsocks
shadowsocks.tech: AEAD encryption + lightweight proxy, no camouflage

hysteria.name: Hysteria2
hysteria.tech: QUIC transport + proprietary congestion control, no ECH

visualization.title: k2v5 Stealth Tunnel Architecture
visualization.subtitle: ECH encrypted handshake + QUIC/TCP-WS dual-stack transport, DPI completely ineffective
visualization.description: k2v5 uses ECH to encrypt SNI during the TLS handshake, preventing firewalls from identifying the target domain. Data is transmitted via QUIC (preferred) or TCP-WebSocket (fallback). The proprietary adaptive congestion control algorithm maintains stable throughput on high-loss networks. The server's built-in reverse proxy forwards non-k2 traffic to a real website, making active probing indistinguishable.
